llm_res.rule: Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!
The ownerOf function must return the address of the owner of the NFT.
The safeTransferFrom function must check if the recipient address is a smart contract and if so, it must implement IERC721Receiver and return the expected function selector.
Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!
